column2: "Ah, my dear <%me>! Terrible news, most terrible! Have you heard?! It happened again!"
"The excitment around Summoner finally started to die down, but then they went and authorized this \"Hero\" Class!"
"Are they trying to hurt my feelings?! Because it's working, and I'm so very sad indeed! Boo hoo hoo hoo hoo..."
"Ignore Katori."
"This new Class was based on research that was commissioned by Huey, I hear."
"Spreading word of the new Class is ultimately a good thing for ARKS. Let me know if there's any way that I can help."
"You're just going to butt in and cut me off with a quip?! I see how it is, Saga!"
"Saga and my dear <%me>, trying to popularize Hero would be effort much better spent on MEEEE!"
"Ah, <%me>! Hello there!"
"Ah! It's you...!"
"Speak of the devil... Or hero, I suppose."
"...Wait, would you two happen to be Mister Saga and Miss Katori?!"
"W-We might be... Why do you ask?!"
"I know the both of you! You're the two people in charge of the Bouncer Class!"
"You've both put so much effort into teaching people all about Bouncer! It's an honor to finally meet you!"
"Huh? Um, w... well, yes, that would be us!"
"Awesome! You're both so cool! Did you two also have a hard time when you were trying to get your Class off the ground?"
"W-Why yes, it was certainly quite a struggle, but thinking of the benefit for everyone in ARKS made it much easier!"
"Miss... Stratos, was it? I believe I heard something about you trying to spread the word of your new Class?"
"Yes! I'm very grateful that you took notice of me! That being said, I'm still far too inexperienced to be as good at this as you two..."
"Even with <%me> helping me out, things have been anything but easy..."
"There's no rush. This is something that takes time. We've also had to come to terms with that with Bouncer."
"We've had to rely on <%me>'s aid plenty of times ourselves. And we're still here today as a result."
"Isn't that right... Katori?"
"Yes! I couldn't have said it better myself!"
"Don't worry, Miss Stratos!"
"With my dear <%me> helping you out, your Class will be popular in no time at all!"
"Mister Saga, Miss Satori... Thank you very much!"
"If it wouldn't trouble you, would it be okay if I asked you for some advice later?"
"Of course, dear! We'll help with whatever we can!"
"...Thank you so very much! Once I finish writing this report, I'll come right back!"
"...Isn't Stratos just the sweetest soul?!"
"My dear <%me>! Saga! What are you waiting for? Let's tell everyone about Hero!"
